org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup

接口 RSGroupAdmin

  • 所有已知实现类:
    RSGroupAdminServer

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface RSGroupAdmin
    Group user API interface used between client and server.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addRSGroup(String groupName)
      Creates a new RegionServer group with the given name.
      boolean balanceRSGroup(String groupName)
      Balance regions in the given RegionServer group.
      RSGroupInfo getRSGroupInfo(String groupName)
      Gets RSGroupInfo for given group name.
      RSGroupInfo getRSGroupInfoOfTable(TableName tableName)
      Gets RSGroupInfo for the given table's group.
      RSGroupInfo getRSGroupOfServer(Address hostPort)
      Retrieve the RSGroupInfo a server is affiliated to
      List<RSGroupInfo> listRSGroups()
      Lists current set of RegionServer groups.
      void moveServers(Set<Address> servers, String targetGroup)
      Move given set of servers to the specified target RegionServer group.
      void moveServersAndTables(Set<Address> servers, Set<TableName> tables, String targetGroup)
      Move given set of servers and tables to the specified target RegionServer group.
      void moveTables(Set<TableName> tables, String targetGroup)
      Move given set of tables to the specified target RegionServer group.
      void removeRSGroup(String groupName)
      Removes RegionServer group associated with the given name.
      void removeServers(Set<Address> servers)
      Remove decommissioned servers from rsgroup. 1.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getRSGroupInfo

        RSGroupInfo getRSGroupInfo(String groupName)
                    throws IOException
        Gets RSGroupInfo for given group name.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getRSGroupInfoOfTable

        RSGroupInfo getRSGroupInfoOfTable(TableName tableName)
                           throws IOException
        Gets RSGroupInfo for the given table's group.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • moveServers

        void moveServers(Set<Address> servers,
                 String targetGroup)
          throws IOException
        Move given set of servers to the specified target RegionServer group.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • moveTables

        void moveTables(Set<TableName> tables,
                String targetGroup)
         throws IOException
        Move given set of tables to the specified target RegionServer group. This will unassign all of a table's region so it can be reassigned to the correct group.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • addRSGroup

        void addRSGroup(String groupName)
         throws IOException
        Creates a new RegionServer group with the given name.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • removeRSGroup

        void removeRSGroup(String groupName)
            throws IOException
        Removes RegionServer group associated with the given name.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • balanceRSGroup

        boolean balanceRSGroup(String groupName)
                throws IOException
        Balance regions in the given RegionServer group.
        返回:
        boolean Whether balance ran or not
        抛出:
        IOException

      • listRSGroups

        List<RSGroupInfo> listRSGroups()
                        throws IOException
        Lists current set of RegionServer groups.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getRSGroupOfServer

        RSGroupInfo getRSGroupOfServer(Address hostPort)
                        throws IOException
        Retrieve the RSGroupInfo a server is affiliated to
        参数:
        hostPort - HostPort to get RSGroupInfo for
        抛出:
        IOException

      • moveServersAndTables

        void moveServersAndTables(Set<Address> servers,
                          Set<TableName> tables,
                          String targetGroup)
                   throws IOException
        Move given set of servers and tables to the specified target RegionServer group.
        参数:
        servers - set of servers to move
        tables - set of tables to move
        targetGroup - the target group name
        抛出:
        IOException - if moving the server and tables fail

      • removeServers

        void removeServers(Set<Address> servers)
            throws IOException
        Remove decommissioned servers from rsgroup. 1. Sometimes we may find the server aborted due to some hardware failure and we must offline the server for repairing. Or we need to move some servers to join other clusters. So we need to remove these servers from the rsgroup. 2. Dead/recovering/live servers will be disallowed.
        参数:
        servers - set of servers to remove
        抛出:
        IOException
